works.description:
The site calling itself mobilism.org is  

displaying my biography illegally, my blurbs, the covers from my books and
 
files of those books in their entirety are being illegally offered to
other  
mobilism.org members. Attempts to contact copyright@mobilism.org were  
ignored. The entire website has been set up for nothing but sharing files 

illegally. There are no other forums, etc. on the webpages.
